output_json.title: Mid Level Wetland Scientist
output_json.summary: Join Soundview Consultants, a well-respected Environmental Consulting Firm, as a Mid-level Wetland Scientist in Gig Harbor, WA.
preferred_degrees: BS degree in Biology, Ecology, Natural or Environmental Sciences, or related field
required_skills: Knowledgeably conduct local and regional assignments
Experience in accurately completing field reconnaissance and investigations/assessments
Technical expertise on wetland and water identification
Classify wetlands with the hydrogeomorphic and Cowardin classification systems
Draft and prepare technical writing tasks
optional_skills: Ability to navigate through rough terrain and dense vegetation
Experience performing routine and atypical wetland delineations
Experience with appropriate supplementary wetland training
Biological assessments and regional assessment methods
Experience with multi-project information and responsibilities
Identification knowledge of Washington plant species
Professional engagement with clients and regulatory personnel
Site planning, SEPA/NEPA process and policy
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Read, write, and speak English at an expert level
output_json.physical_requirements: Ability to navigate through rough terrain and dense vegetation
output_json.company_information: Soundview Consultants is a well-respected Environmental Consulting Firm with offices in Gig Harbor, Mt. Vernon, and Cle Elum, Washington.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Soundview Consultants encourages applicants from all backgrounds to apply for our positions and hopes you will join us on our continuous path to diversity, equity, and inclusion.
